mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.sushe_id as susheId ,a.xuesheng_id as xueshengId ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,sushe.loudong_types as loudongTypes ,sushe.danyuan_types as danyuanTypes ,sushe.sushe_uuid_number as susheUuidNumber ,sushe.sushe_address as susheAddress ,sushe.juzhu_number as juzhuNumber ,sushe.sushe_content as susheContent ,xuesheng.xuesheng_uuid_number as xueshengUuidNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,xuesheng.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto
FROM sushe_ren a left JOIN sushe sushe ON a.sushe_id = sushe.id left JOIN xuesheng xuesheng ON a.xuesheng_id = xuesheng.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.sushe_id = #{params.susheId} )
and ( a.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} )
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.sushe_id IS NOT NULL
and sushe.loudong_types = #{params.loudongTypes}
and sushe.danyuan_types = #{params.danyuanTypes}
and sushe.sushe_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheUuidNumber},'%')
and sushe.sushe_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheAddress},'%')
and sushe.juzhu_number >= #{params.juzhuNumberStart}
and sushe.juzhu_number <= #{params.juzhuNumberEnd}
and sushe.juzhu_number = #{params.juzhuNumber}
and sushe.sushe_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sushe.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sushe.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.xuesheng_id IS NOT NULL
and xuesheng.xuesheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengUuidNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
